sentences.sentence: Dr. Craven turned reproachfully to Mrs. Medlock.
sentences.translation: 克雷文医生转向梅德洛克太太，脸上一副责备的神情。

sentences.sentence: When he was near her, he said reproachfully: "You really might come with me to-day!"
sentences.translation: 他走近她，用责备的口气说：“你今天真该跟我一起去！”

sentences.sentence: Luke's mother stopped smiling and looked reproachfully at him.
sentences.translation: 卢克的母亲收起了笑容，用责备的眼光看着他。
